code: @Override @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     deleteDirectory("target/data/fpc").     super.setUp(). }

@Test public void testFilePollingConsumer() throws Exception {     template.sendBodyAndHeader("file://target/data/fpc", "Hello World", Exchange.FILE_NAME, "hello.txt").     Endpoint endpoint = context.getEndpoint("file://target/data/fpc?initialDelay=0&delay=10&fileName=hello.txt").     PollingConsumer consumer = endpoint.createPollingConsumer().     consumer.start().     Exchange exchange = consumer.receive(5000).     assertNotNull(exchange).     assertEquals("hello.txt", exchange.getIn().getHeader(Exchange.FILE_NAME, String.class)).     assertEquals("Hello World", exchange.getIn().getBody(String.class)).     consumer.stop(). }
